body: 5 (return) [ Sozomen, l. i. c. 22. Socrates, l. i. c. 10. These historians have been suspected, but I think without reason, of an attachment to the Novatian doctrine. The emperor said to the bishop, ÒAcesius, take a ladder, and get up to heaven by yourself.Ó Most of the Christian sects have, by turns, borrowed the ladder of Acesius.]
